name: Cheese It!
description:
4 thieves, in a safehouse. A million cops at the door. A pile of money in the room, and 90 seconds to escape!

Mash A to grab as much money as you can, but keep the cops at bay or you'll all get busted. When the car shows up, get inside. Whoever escapes with the most money, wins! (Just like in real life.)

Currently requires 4 players and 4 controllers, but we'll try to offer other options soon.
